name: george2
body:
#General
Unless specifically stated otherwise, all code I publish to GitHub is available under a [BSD 3-clause license](http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause). 

If you need to contact me for some reason other than to submit an issue or pull request (though I can't imagine why you would), ping me on [freenode](irc://irc.freenode.net), or [email](https://github.com/george2/pkgbuilds/blob/master/dff/PKGBUILD) me. 

#Languages
Regardless of what GitHub says, these are the languages I generally work with:
* Shell (*nix/DOS)
* C
* C++ (with/without Qt Framework)
* Python (with/without Qt Framework)
* AutoHotkey

I also have some amount of familiarity with:
* VB.NET
* Java
* PHP
* x86 Assembly
* JavaScript

Other non-programming languages I use:
* HTML 4.01 Strict
* CSS 2.1
* XML (RSS/ATOM)

#ccr-tools
This is a GitHub organization I belong to. We write code for [Chakra GNU/Linux](http://chakra-linux.org/)'s source-based [community repository](http://chakra-linux.org/ccr/). The code is mostly bash or Python. You can learn more about the ccr-tools [here](http://ccr-tools.github.io).

#Repositories
Here's some info about my repos.
###ahk-libs
A collection of AutoHotkey libraries from arount the internet. [Details](http://george2.github.io/ahk-libs)

###aur2ccr
A massive and terribly-written bash script that helps put Arch packages into the Chakra Community Repository. [Details](http://george2.github.io/aur2ccr)

###bundles
Some now-obsolete source files for non-supported Chakra bundles, and a bash script to manage them. [View](http://github.com/george2/bundles)

###ccr-tools
Miscellaneous tools for the Chakra Community Repository. [Details](http://george2.github.io/ccr-tools)

###dns-bash
Strange bash scripts with dubious usefulness, all related to the domain name system. [Details](http://george2.github.io/dns-bash)

###dotfiles
They're dotfiles. [Details](http://george2.github.io/dns-bash)

###george2.github.com
I'm So Meta, Even This Acronym. [View](http://github.com/george2/george2.github.com)

###ha-cluster-scripts
These will work soon(TM). [Details](http://george2.github.io/ha-cluster-scripts)

###kapudan-kde-themes
Some [KDE](http://kde.org/) themes for [Kapudan](http://chakra-project.org/wiki/index.php?title=Kapudan). [View](http://github.com/george2/kapudan-kde-themes)

###math-c
Math stuff in C/C++. [Details](http://george2.github.io/math-c)

###misc-bash
Miscellaneous bash scripts, including the amazing `bundle`. [Details](http://george2.github.io/misc-bash)

###misc-chakra
Miscellaneous bash scripts that only work with [Chakra GNU/Linux](http://www.chakra-project.org/). [Details](http://george2.github.io/misc-chakra)

###pkgbuild-tools
Yeah... this doesn't exist. Sorry. [View](http://github.com/george2/pkgbuild-tools)

###pkgbuilds
My source files for [CCR](http://chakra-linux.org/ccr/) packages. [Details](http://george2.github.io/pkgbuilds)

###slipm-honeypot
A buggy and moderately useless honeypot script with a ridiculous name, written in bash. [Details](http://george2.github.io/slipm-honeypot)

###spun
A bash script that works as an update notification tool for [Chakra GNU/Linux](http://www.chakra-project.org/). [Details](http://george2.github.io/spun)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
